title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Explanation (2 points)

Cells expressing only S1 do not survive.

Cells do not have an R protein OR have no protection (from nuclease activity).

Description (2 points)

Culture 2/Cells with S1 and R1 survive.

Culture 3/Cells with S1 and R2 do not survive.
